services.name: Patient Medical History Retrieval Service
services.description: This API enables healthcare providers secure access to a patient's historical medical records, facilitating diagnosis and treatment planning. By integrating with hospital EMR systems, authenticated users can search for records by patient ID.

services.name: Appointment Scheduling API
services.description: A RESTful service to assist patients in scheduling, rescheduling, or canceling appointments with healthcare professionals, ensuring optimal time management through real-time availability checking.

services.name: Medication Interaction Checker
services.description: This service analyzes prescribed medications for potential interactions, improving patient safety by providing healthcare professionals with actionable alerts when prescribing new treatments.

services.name: Pharmacy Inventory Management System
services.description: A platform for pharmacy management to monitor and adjust inventory levels based on prescription demands and expiration dates, ensuring stock optimization and reducing waste.

services.name: Health Risk Assessment Tool
services.description: This API evaluates a patient's health risk based on input data like lifestyle, family history, or existing conditions, offering tailored health advice and preventive measures based on advanced analytics algorithms.
